title: Pset_UnitaryControlElementPHistory
description: Properties for history and operating schedules of thermostats.  HISTORY: Added in IFC4.

Mode.title: Mode
Mode.description: Indicates operation mode corresponding to Pset_UnitaryControlTypeCommon.Mode.  For example, 'HEAT', 'COOL', 'AUTO'.

Fan.title: Fan
Fan.description: Indicates fan operation where True is on, False is off, and Unknown is automatic.

SetPoint.title: SetPoint
SetPoint.description: Indicates the temperature setpoint.  For thermostats with setbacks or separate high and low setpoints, then the time series may contain a pair of values at each entry where the first value is the heating setpoint (low) and the second value is the cooling setpoint (high).
